column1: This page demonstrates the enhanced MultiBlockListResolver that can create images directly from URLs and file paths, eliminating the need to pre-create media items.
The image below is created directly from a URL. The resolver downloads the image and creates a media item automatically.
You can mix and match different image sources in the same page.
The carousel below demonstrates creating multiple images from URLs in a single carousel block.
Video blocks work just like before, embedding YouTube videos by URL.
Here's an example of using the new media creation feature in your CSV files.
Icon links can also use URLs for the icon images.
• Support for URLs, file paths, and GUIDs
